none: Letter to Louis L. McInnis from A. J. Rose, July 19, 1890
Letter to Louis L. McInnis from A. J. Rose, July 19, 1890
Box 2 Louis L. McInnis Papers/Box 2 Folder 3 Louis L. McInnis Papers

body.value:
State Agricultural and Mechanical College
OF TEXAS.
(TECHNICAL BRANCH OF THE UNIVERSITY.)

A. J. ROSE, President Board of Directors, Salado Texas.
T. M. SCOTT, Agent of the Board, College Station, Texas.
LOUIS L. McINNIS, Secretary and Treasurer, College Station, Texas.

Salado, Texas, July 19th 1890

Louis L McInnis
College Station Txas
Dear Prof

I have your letter 17th
before me. In reply will say that I dont see
how I can add more than is contained in my
letter of 18th I dont believe that the Board intended
to do you a wrong dont think they have any
personal feelings against you whatever,
please state to me plainly what you think
the Board should do to relieve you from
the false impression in which you are placed
over the State, I endeavored to explain to you as
I understood it that the Board believed that
the best interest of the College prompted their
action, I believe that all the members think
kindly of you.

With my kindest regards to
you and family
I am yours Truly
A. J. Rose
